def hello():
    print("Hello")

def hey():
    print("Hey")

<<<<<<<
def add(a, b):
    return a + b
=======
def add(x, y):
    return x + y
>>>>>>>

def what_is_up():
    print("What is up?")

def howdy():
    print("Howdy!")

<<<<<<<
def subtract(a, b):
    return a - b
=======
def subtract(x, y):
    return x - y
>>>>>>>

def goodbye():
    print("Goodbye")
